title: Birthday
body:
Heya :) Well, since today is my birthday (21) I was wondering if there were any Riot members/other forum goers who were interested in playing a game or two sometime today or tomorrow? 

My IGN is Liamface so send me a message if you're interested!

replies.body:
Also Happy Birthday!

May you slay Teemo's soul :)
I'll play with you, but if you're shit nty, get better first.
There seems to be a ton of 20ish yr olds in the LoL community these days...or are 20ish yr olds just speaking up about their ages?
